title: Mixed fruit and cranberry loaf
ingredients: ['140g mixed dried fruit', '50g dried cranberries', '200ml hot black tea', '450g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '110g caster sugar', '125g butter chopped', '250ml semi-skimmed milk', '2 medium eggs', 'almond flakes for bottom of tin (optional)']
